song.title: Jesus Paid it All
song.lyrics:
[1] . G I hear the Saviour say . D G Thy strength indeed is small .G C Child of weakness watch and pray . G D G Find in me thine all in all
[C] .G C Jesus paid it all .G D All to Him I owe .G C Sin had left a crimson stain . G D G He washed it white as snow ---
[2] . G Lord now indeed I find . D G Thy power and thine alone . G C Can change the lepers spots . G D G And melt the heart of stone
[3] . G And when before the throne . D G I stand in him complete .D/F# Em C Jesus died my soul to save . G D G My lips shall still repeat
[T1] . G C Oh praise the one who paid my debt . G C And raised this life up from the dead
[T2] . Em C Oh praise the one who paid my debt . G D And raised this life up from the dead
song.presentation: 1 C 2 C 3 C T1 T2 C
